title: Comradeship
creator_credit: G Pabst, Aubert Film, Franco-Film, Gaumont and Nero-Film
brief_description: The dramatic story of a mining disaster shortly after World War I on the French-German border. Post war tension and bitterness are put aside when the German miners help rescue their French comrades. Emphasising worker solidarity. In German and French with English subtitles.
